name: Derek Rydall
what_you_do: Bestselling author, life coach, and consultant helping people master inner technology — their nervous systems, emotions, stories, wounds, purpose, and creativity — to thrive in the AI age.
who_you_serve: Emmy and Academy Award winners, Fortune 500 executives, and leaders in business, spirituality, and the healing arts.
social_proof: Bestselling author, consultant for Emmy and Academy Award winners and Fortune 500 executives, writes for HuffPost and Spirituality & Health, active speaker with global audiences.
signature_programs: A Whole New Human (book), The Life Code, Awakened Wealth & Work
business_focus: Helping people remain fully human and become irreplaceable in a world increasingly shaped by AI and machines.
service_provided: Life coaching, consulting, speaking, authorship, workshops and gatherings
